item.title: About gitignore
item.author: Lingyun Yang
item.description: What is .gitignore .gitignore is a file that Git uses to determine which files and directories to ignore, and not track, when performing operations.

item.title: How to set HomeBrew in an M1 Mac
item.author: Lingyun Yang
item.description: What problems happens here? When I installed brew following the instruction from the Homebrew official website, the error zsh: command not found: brew happens.

item.title: Git branch operation
item.author: Lingyun Yang
item.description: Introduce to git branch operation 1. What is an branch? Sometimes there may be multiple people developing functions or fixing bugs for a same software at the same time, there may be multiple Release versions, and each version needs to be maintained.

item.title: Git - How to remove and create SSH key
item.author: Lingyun Yang
item.description: How to remove and create SSH key create SSH key first step : check the local ssh cd ~/.

item.title: Multiple github account in the same computer
item.author: Lingyun Yang
item.description: Manage multiple github accounts in the same computer Sometimes we may have two or more github accounts in order to mamnagement different contents, and we need to deal with those accounts in the same computer.

item.title: Modify files created and modified time
item.author: Lingyun Yang
item.description: In the Mac OS system, every file have two main time attribute: “Create Time” and " Modify Time", they can be check by clicking the file and select get info button.
